name: Am I Seeing Things?
description:
Based on the real life experiences of a man living with bipolar disorder, "Am I Seeing Things?" let's you use your phone camera (that's your "in-game" phone camera) to check to see, if what you see, is in fact, what you see.

This Game was created and submitted for Brackey's Gamejam 2022.1.

Engine - Unity 2019.4.20f1

Default Controls
Move - W,A,S,D
Look - Move Mouse
Hold up phone camera - Hold right mouse button
Confirm hallucination - Click left mouse button while targeting hallucination
